I'm attempting to calculate the hop count from the seed to the crawled 
resource by examining the crawl.log produced for each job.  I'm simply 
counting the number of consecutive R, E, X, or L's after the URI.  For 
example, if crawl.log had

... http://foo.org/abc.html LE ...

I would count this as a hop count of 2 from foo.org (assuming that was 
the seed).

Am I overlooking anything?

Thanks,
Frank
